sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Col, Row, Button, Form, Card, FormGroup, Jumbotron, Container, Label, Input, FormText, InputGroup, CardHeader, CardBody, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText } from "reactstrap"; import Select from 'react-select' import { motion } from "framer-motion" import { Link, NavLink, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; const typeOptions = [ { value: 'chocolate', label: 'Day' }, { value: 'strawberry', label: 'Week' }, { value: 'vanilla', label: 'Month' } ] const numOptions = [] for(var i = 0;i < 366; i += 1) { numOptions.push({value:i,label:i}) } class CreateOption extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.readTextFile = this.readTextFile.bind(this); this.state = {userFriendly: new Boolean()}; } handleSubmit = (e) => { this.props.history.push("/admin/searchplayer"); /*this.setState({ error: err.response.data.Message, });*/ //this.togglewarningModal(); }; readTextFile(file, callback) { var rawFile = new XMLHttpRequest(); rawFile.overrideMimeType("application/json"); rawFile.open("GET", file, true); rawFile.onreadystatechange = function() { if (rawFile.readyState === 4 && rawFile.status == "200") { callback(rawFile.responseText); } } rawFile.send(null); } render() { let dataFile = require('../assets/mainnetAddresses.json'); console.log(dataFile.ethereumAddresses.networks[1]); const spring = { type: "spring", stiffness: 700, damping: 30 }; if (this.state.userFriendly == true) { return (
this.setState({userFriendly:false})} style ={{float:"right"}}>
); } else { return (
this.setState({userFriendly:true})} style ={{float:"right"}}>
); } } } export default CreateOption;
